verses.text_plain: Blessed is he that considereth the poor: the Lord will deliver him in time of trouble.
verses.verse_html:
1Blessed is he that considereth the poor: the Lord will deliver him in time of trouble. ▼
▼ the poor: or, the weak, or, sick
 , ▼
▼ in time…: Heb. in the day of evil

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the poor: or, the weak, or, sick
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the poor: or, the weak, or, sick

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in time…: Heb. in the day of evil
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in time…: Heb. in the day of evil

verses.text_plain: The Lord will preserve him, and keep him alive; and he shall be blessed upon the earth: and thou wilt not deliver him unto the will of his enemies.
verses.verse_html:
2The Lord will preserve him, and keep him alive; and he shall be blessed upon the earth: and thou wilt not deliver him unto the will of his enemies. ▼
▼ thou…: or, do not thou deliver

footnotes.body_text: ▼ thou…: or, do not thou deliver
footnotes.body_html: ▼ thou…: or, do not thou deliver

verses.text_plain: The Lord will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness.
verses.verse_html:
3The Lord will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness. ▼
▼ make: Heb. turn

verses.text_plain: I said, Lord, be merciful unto me: heal my soul; for I have sinned against thee.
verses.verse_html: 4I said, Lord, be merciful unto me: heal my soul; for I have sinned against thee.

verses.text_plain: Mine enemies speak evil of me, When shall he die, and his name perish?
verses.verse_html: 5Mine enemies speak evil of me, When shall he die, and his name perish?

tokens.text: of me, When shall he die

verses.text_plain: And if he come to see me, he speaketh vanity: his heart gathereth iniquity to itself; when he goeth abroad, he telleth it.
verses.verse_html: 6And if he come to see me, he speaketh vanity: his heart gathereth iniquity to itself; when he goeth abroad, he telleth it.

verses.text_plain: All that hate me whisper together against me: against me do they devise my hurt.
verses.verse_html:
7All that hate me whisper together against me: against me do they devise my hurt. ▼
▼ my…: Heb. evil to me

tokens.text: against me: against me do they devise

footnotes.body_html: ▼ my…: Heb. evil to me

verses.text_plain: An evil disease, say they, cleaveth fast unto him: and now that he lieth he shall rise up no more.
verses.verse_html:
8An evil disease, say they, cleaveth fast unto him: and now that he lieth he shall rise up no more. ▼
▼ An…: Heb. A thing of Belial

footnotes.body_text: ▼ An…: Heb. A thing of Belial
footnotes.body_html: ▼ An…: Heb. A thing of Belial

verses.text_plain: Yea, mine own familiar friend, in whom I trusted, which did eat of my bread, hath lifted up his heel against me.
verses.verse_html:
9Yea, mine own familiar friend, in whom I trusted, which did eat of my bread, hath lifted up his heel against me. ▼
▼ mine…: Heb. the man of my peace
 , ▼
▼ lifted…: Heb. magnified

footnotes.body_text: ▼ mine…: Heb. the man of my peace
footnotes.body_html: ▼ mine…: Heb. the man of my peace

verses.text_plain: But thou, O Lord, be merciful unto me, and raise me up, that I may requite them.
verses.verse_html: 10But thou, O Lord, be merciful unto me, and raise me up, that I may requite them.

tokens.text: unto me, and raise me up

verses.text_plain: By this I know that thou favourest me, because mine enemy doth not triumph over me.
verses.verse_html: 11By this I know that thou favourest me, because mine enemy doth not triumph over me.

verses.text_plain: And as for me, thou upholdest me in mine integrity, and settest me before thy face for ever.
verses.verse_html: 12And as for me, thou upholdest me in mine integrity, and settest me before thy face for ever.

tokens.text: And as for me, thou upholdest

verses.text_plain: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel from everlasting, and to everlasting. Amen, and Amen.
verses.verse_html: 13Blessed be the Lord God of Israel from everlasting, and to everlasting. Amen, and Amen.
